text:
July 28, 1959
Mrs. Dorothy Smith
ACE-TV Committee
American Council on Education
1785 Massachusetts Avenue, N. W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Dorothy:
I am taking the liberty of sending you a copy of our forthcoming NAEB
Network offering. I thought you might be Interested in what the
nation's educational radio network is doing. I also thought you
might have particular interest in the programs listed on pages 9, 10,
13, 14, 19, 20, 23, 39, 41, 44, 45, 52, and 53.
Sincerely,
hjsnrs
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
